Linkes: So, I explain to you the task. I"ll give you a device treasure hunt with which you have to find Suspicious mechanisms. Then you should move to the upper floor of the Tower Marshlands. If you kill Martesa and eject it from the body core of Martesa, you can come back. Why? Do not you understand? It seemed to me that there is no need for a long explanation... Anything you do not understand? If so, do not hesitate to ask.
